original: Thank goodness! I'm saved!
translation: Thank goodness! I'm saved!

original: I knew we could rely on you, Shuu♪
translation: I knew we could rely on you, Shuu♪

original:
Now that Shuu has opened up
the Gate,
It means that this DigiPort is now
usable.
So why aren't you going back
to the DigiBase...?
translation:
Now that Shuu has opened up
the Gate,
It means that this DigiPort is now
usable.
So why aren't you going back
to the DigiBase...?

original: It's impossible.
translation: It's impossible.

original: What...?
translation: What...?

original:
Well you see, when the Bandits
captured us...
They also stole the Black Box 
from the DigiShip!
translation:
Well you see, when the Bandits
captured us...
They also stole the Black Box 
from the DigiShip!

original:
I feel like I've heard of this 
'Black Box' somewhere before...
Isn't that a very important part
of the DigiShip...?
translation:
I feel like I've heard of this 
'Black Box' somewhere before...
Isn't that a very important part
of the DigiShip...?

original:
It's extremely important!
Without the Black Box...
The DigiShip is unable to leave
this island!
translation:
It's extremely important!
Without the Black Box...
The DigiShip is unable to leave
this island!

original:
Please, Shuu!
Go and capture those Bandits,
And take back our Black Box!
translation:
Please, Shuu!
Go and capture those Bandits,
And take back our Black Box!

original:
It hasn't been long since we were
locked in here,
So they can't have gone too far!

I'm counting on you, Shuu... Okay?
translation:
It hasn't been long since we were
locked in here,
So they can't have gone too far!

I'm counting on you, Shuu... Okay?

original:
Oh, Shuu!
Welcome back!
Did you find the Black Box??
translation:
Oh, Shuu!
Welcome back!
Did you find the Black Box??

original:
T-that's fine! 
I'm sure you can handle it, Shuu!
You just gotta Momentai!
translation:
T-that's fine! 
I'm sure you can handle it, Shuu!
You just gotta Momentai!

original: Good luck, Shuu!
translation: Good luck, Shuu!

original:
Welcome back, Shuu!
How'd it go?
What's that...?
You found Dos...?
translation:
Welcome back, Shuu!
How'd it go?
What's that...?
You found Dos...?

original:
Isn't Dos that skinny guy in the
Bandits group?
He's the most technologically
inclined among the Bandits,
So I'm certain he's the one who
stole the Black Box!
translation:
Isn't Dos that skinny guy in the
Bandits group?
He's the most technologically
inclined among the Bandits,
So I'm certain he's the one who
stole the Black Box!

original: But isn't it kinda strange...?
translation: But isn't it kinda strange...?

original:
Why would he be loitering around
here instead of escaping...?
And all on his own, at that...
translation:
Why would he be loitering around
here instead of escaping...?
And all on his own, at that...

original:
It's most likely Uno and Tres
are nearby, too...
translation:
It's most likely Uno and Tres
are nearby, too...

original:
If that's the case, then their 
intentions are pretty clear.
They probably intend to steal
something else from us, too.
translation:
If that's the case, then their 
intentions are pretty clear.
They probably intend to steal
something else from us, too.

original:
W-what should we do??
We can't run from here right now!
translation:
W-what should we do??
We can't run from here right now!

original:
Don't worry about it, 
just Momentaiii!
translation:
Don't worry about it, 
just Momentaiii!

original:
Those Bandits aren't a problem, so
long as Shuu is around!
After all, Shuu is the best Tamer 
there is!
translation:
Those Bandits aren't a problem, so
long as Shuu is around!
After all, Shuu is the best Tamer 
there is!

original:
Y-y-you're right! I'm sure!
Shuu will be totally fine...!
There's not a single Tamer that
can stand up to Shuu!
translation:
Y-y-you're right! I'm sure!
Shuu will be totally fine...!
There's not a single Tamer that
can stand up to Shuu!

original:
I believe the one with the Black Box
is most likely their leader, Uno.
If you follow Dos, I'm sure you'll
be able to find Uno, too.
translation:
I believe the one with the Black Box
is most likely their leader, Uno.
If you follow Dos, I'm sure you'll
be able to find Uno, too.

original: Good luck, Shuu!
translation: Good luck, Shuu!

original:
Welcome back, Shuu!
Did you find those Bandits?!
What...? You haven't yet...?

But I'm sure you should find Uno
if you just follow after Dos...
translation:
Welcome back, Shuu!
Did you find those Bandits?!
What...? You haven't yet...?

But I'm sure you should find Uno
if you just follow after Dos...

original:
Please, Shuu!
You've gotta go find them!
Find them and get our Black Box
back!
translation:
Please, Shuu!
You've gotta go find them!
Find them and get our Black Box
back!

original:
Looks like a strange uninvited
guest has shown up...
I've got a bad feeling about this...
I'd better contact Tres.
translation:
Looks like a strange uninvited
guest has shown up...
I've got a bad feeling about this...
I'd better contact Tres.

original:
Hey, Tres! Respond quickly.
This isn't good.
That twerp Tamer is loitering 
around the DigiPort...
I can't get to the energy
connector with him hanging around.
Could you go distract him for me?
translation:
Hey, Tres! Respond quickly.
This isn't good.
That twerp Tamer is loitering 
around the DigiPort...
I can't get to the energy
connector with him hanging around.
Could you go distract him for me?

original:
Why do I have to go...?

Why can't you deal with both 
problems at the same time??
Which reminds me, 
I hope you didn't forget, Dos...
If you lose to that kid this time,
you're getting a nice, shaved head!
translation:
Why do I have to go...?

Why can't you deal with both 
problems at the same time??
Which reminds me, 
I hope you didn't forget, Dos...
If you lose to that kid this time,
you're getting a nice, shaved head!

original:
.........
Ouch! Ow, ow, ow, ow...
My stomach suddenly started 
hurting really bad!
translation:
.........
Ouch! Ow, ow, ow, ow...
My stomach suddenly started 
hurting really bad!

original:
What kind of excuse is that?!
Stop running and start fighting!
translation:
What kind of excuse is that?!
Stop running and start fighting!

original:
My head is hurting a lot, too,,,
I'd better retreat for now!
translation:
My head is hurting a lot, too,,,
I'd better retreat for now!

original:
It would be such a simple matter to
take that kid down,
It's just such a pity my stomach 
suddenly started acting up...!
Looks like I've also escaped having
my head shaven, too...!
translation:
It would be such a simple matter to
take that kid down,
It's just such a pity my stomach 
suddenly started acting up...!
Looks like I've also escaped having
my head shaven, too...!

original:
Fine, fine, I get it.

You would have won if you did fight
them, I know.
translation:
Fine, fine, I get it.

You would have won if you did fight
them, I know.

original:
...So why don't you go ahead and
fight them?
translation:
...So why don't you go ahead and
fight them?

original:
Y-y-y-you followed me all this
way...?!
You stalker!
Police! Come quick!
translation:
Y-y-y-you followed me all this
way...?!
You stalker!
Police! Come quick!

original:
...What's with that dumb act?
Just give it up already.
translation:
...What's with that dumb act?
Just give it up already.

original:
I-I-I-I have no problem fighting
them, but...
Ladies first... isn't that right...?
translation:
I-I-I-I have no problem fighting
them, but...
Ladies first... isn't that right...?

original:
Argh, alright, enough already with
your complaining.
I'll just have to beat some sense
into you myself!
translation:
Argh, alright, enough already with
your complaining.
I'll just have to beat some sense
into you myself!

original:
Fine then, I'll do it!
I've made up my mind!
Well, not really...
But I'll do it, anyway!
I'll show you how a real man
does things!
translation:
Fine then, I'll do it!
I've made up my mind!
Well, not really...
But I'll do it, anyway!
I'll show you how a real man
does things!

original:
If spirit alone was all that was 
needed to win,
Life would be a lot easier,
don't you think?
Now then, have you learned your
lesson, boys and girls?
In a situation like this, the best 
option is to...
RETREAT!
translation:
If spirit alone was all that was 
needed to win,
Life would be a lot easier,
don't you think?
Now then, have you learned your
lesson, boys and girls?
In a situation like this, the best 
option is to...
RETREAT!

original:
I'm sure they've learned a pretty
valuable lesson,
That being not to judge a Tamer's
ability by looks alone.
And that good-for-nothing losers
will always remain that way...
But remember this...
No matter how powerful you are,
Working alone will only get you
so far, you got that?
translation:
I'm sure they've learned a pretty
valuable lesson,
That being not to judge a Tamer's
ability by looks alone.
And that good-for-nothing losers
will always remain that way...
But remember this...
No matter how powerful you are,
Working alone will only get you
so far, you got that?

original:
What??
I don't get it at all!
What does all this have to do with
gettin' the connector?!
translation:
What??
I don't get it at all!
What does all this have to do with
gettin' the connector?!

original:
That's not the issue here...

That boy was trying to escape, 
but my stomach got messed up,
And then I started getting a
headache, and...
translation:
That's not the issue here...

That boy was trying to escape, 
but my stomach got messed up,
And then I started getting a
headache, and...

original:
Shut it! I have no clue what 
you're goin' on about!
I'm the one who'll be gettin' a
headache listenin' to all that!
translation:
Shut it! I have no clue what 
you're goin' on about!
I'm the one who'll be gettin' a
headache listenin' to all that!

original:
Aw man...
Can't the DigiShip hurry it up...?
I don't like getting all dirty.
translation:
Aw man...
Can't the DigiShip hurry it up...?
I don't like getting all dirty.

original:
Oh my... more importantly, it looks 
like that Tamer has come back.
translation:
Oh my... more importantly, it looks 
like that Tamer has come back.

original:
What?! This guy!
He chased us all the way here?!
translation:
What?! This guy!
He chased us all the way here?!

original:
Ugh... Of all people...
It had to be you again...?!
translation:
Ugh... Of all people...
It had to be you again...?!

original:
You want the Black Box back?
Enough of your whinin'!
If we were plannin' on giving it 
back that easily,
We wouldn't have bothered takin'
it in the first place!
translation:
You want the Black Box back?
Enough of your whinin'!
If we were plannin' on giving it 
back that easily,
We wouldn't have bothered takin'
it in the first place!

original:
Right now, we really, truly need 
that Black Box!
With that Box, as well as the 
energy connector...
We can get all the Lost Digimon
to the Real World...!
translation:
Right now, we really, truly need 
that Black Box!
With that Box, as well as the 
energy connector...
We can get all the Lost Digimon
to the Real World...!

original:
Be quiet, Dos. 
That has nothin' to do with him.
And I couldn't care less what he 
plans to do, either.
All that matters is he's in the way,
and he needs to get lost.
translation:
Be quiet, Dos. 
That has nothin' to do with him.
And I couldn't care less what he 
plans to do, either.
All that matters is he's in the way,
and he needs to get lost.

original:
And if you've got a problem with
that, then go ahead and stop me.
That's the way of the Digital World!
translation:
And if you've got a problem with
that, then go ahead and stop me.
That's the way of the Digital World!

original:
What? You actually want to fight?
Aren't you a unique one.
translation:
What? You actually want to fight?
Aren't you a unique one.

original:
Well that's fine and all, but what 
if you really do lose to him?
Don't tell me you'll actually return
the Black Box to them...
...Will you?
translation:
Well that's fine and all, but what 
if you really do lose to him?
Don't tell me you'll actually return
the Black Box to them...
...Will you?

original:
Gimme a break here...

If we return this box, all our work
until now will be for naught!
All we need to do is defeat this kid
and make a run for it, right??
translation:
Gimme a break here...

If we return this box, all our work
until now will be for naught!
All we need to do is defeat this kid
and make a run for it, right??

original:
...Yeah, you're right.

We've only made it this far 
because we've been like this.
But it's such a pain to have to
sneak and run away all the time!
Just think about it for a minute.

Can you just run away from a 
fight you, yourself, started?!
translation:
...Yeah, you're right.

We've only made it this far 
because we've been like this.
But it's such a pain to have to
sneak and run away all the time!
Just think about it for a minute.

Can you just run away from a 
fight you, yourself, started?!

original:
If he somehow manages to win
against me, he can have the Box.
And no one has any right to 
complain about that,
Because I will not lose!
translation:
If he somehow manages to win
against me, he can have the Box.
And no one has any right to 
complain about that,
Because I will not lose!

original:
.........

Well I guess it would be pretty cool
to actually see you win for once.
translation:
.........

Well I guess it would be pretty cool
to actually see you win for once.

original:
You're a man, too, aren't you?!

A man can only look ahead,
there's no option to run away!
translation:
You're a man, too, aren't you?!

A man can only look ahead,
there's no option to run away!

original:
Say all you want, but it'll all be
pointless if you lose!
translation:
Say all you want, but it'll all be
pointless if you lose!

original:
Shut up!
Look who's talkin'!
Didn't you also lose to this same
kid earlier?!
Don't go lookin' down on me so 
smug with that huge nose of yours!
translation:
Shut up!
Look who's talkin'!
Didn't you also lose to this same
kid earlier?!
Don't go lookin' down on me so 
smug with that huge nose of yours!

original:
These two really are completely
beyond help.
Why must all men be such idiots...
translation:
These two really are completely
beyond help.
Why must all men be such idiots...

original:
Alright! The DigiShip's here,
Playtime's over!
If you don't hurry, I'll leave the 
both of you behind!
translation:
Alright! The DigiShip's here,
Playtime's over!
If you don't hurry, I'll leave the 
both of you behind!

original: H-hey Tres, wait a minute...!
translation: H-hey Tres, wait a minute...!

original:
...Hmph.

This was our last chance to escape
this place...
But I guess that's how things are,
I'll have to think of another way.
translation:
...Hmph.

This was our last chance to escape
this place...
But I guess that's how things are,
I'll have to think of another way.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
I'll let you go this time, but next 
time you won't be so lucky!
Don't forget that!
translation:
I'll let you go this time, but next 
time you won't be so lucky!
Don't forget that!

original:
Oh, Shuu!
Did you find the Bandits??
I was worried because we couldn't
get in contact with you...
...What?
You found the Black Box??
You got it back? 
From the Bandits??
H-how on earth did you...
You defeated them?!
B-both of them?!?
Whaaat???
That's unbelieveable!
You're incredible, Shuu!
Thanks to you, we can finally
return to the DigiBase!
We'll be waiting for you
at the DigiPort♪
translation:
Oh, Shuu!
Did you find the Bandits??
I was worried because we couldn't
get in contact with you...
...What?
You found the Black Box??
You got it back? 
From the Bandits??
H-how on earth did you...
You defeated them?!
B-both of them?!?
Whaaat???
That's unbelieveable!
You're incredible, Shuu!
Thanks to you, we can finally
return to the DigiBase!
We'll be waiting for you
at the DigiPort♪

original:
The trial version ends here.

Thanks for playing!
translation:
The trial version ends here.

Thanks for playing!

original:
.........
Well, a win is a win, I guess.
But we did act pretty desperate
and immature...
translation:
.........
Well, a win is a win, I guess.
But we did act pretty desperate
and immature...

original:
You've gotta be kiddin' me?! Can't
you see how strong this kid is?!
We'll never stand a chance if we're
so concerned about how we look!
On top of that, when we lose, all
you do is complain!
Isn't that right, you pathetic loser?
translation:
You've gotta be kiddin' me?! Can't
you see how strong this kid is?!
We'll never stand a chance if we're
so concerned about how we look!
On top of that, when we lose, all
you do is complain!
Isn't that right, you pathetic loser?

original:
Jeez... 
And what's with that smug look...
It makes me feel uneasy...
translation:
Jeez... 
And what's with that smug look...
It makes me feel uneasy...

original:
Shut it! 
No matter how cool you try to look,
It doesn't mean anything if you 
can't win!
Besides, not only are you uncool,
but you're always a loser, too!
You're the worst of the worst!
Just quit the Bandits, already!
translation:
Shut it! 
No matter how cool you try to look,
It doesn't mean anything if you 
can't win!
Besides, not only are you uncool,
but you're always a loser, too!
You're the worst of the worst!
Just quit the Bandits, already!

original:
The both of you look uncool 
regardless if you're winning or not.
Plus...
I'm the one who wants to quit...
translation:
The both of you look uncool 
regardless if you're winning or not.
Plus...
I'm the one who wants to quit...

original:
Alright! The DigiShip's here,
Playtime's over!
If you don't hurry, I'll leave the 
both of you behind!
translation:
Alright! The DigiShip's here,
Playtime's over!
If you don't hurry, I'll leave the 
both of you behind!

original: H-hey Tres, wait a minute...!
translation: H-hey Tres, wait a minute...!

original:
...Hmph.

This was our last chance to escape
this place...
But I guess thats how things are,
I'll have to think of another way.
translation:
...Hmph.

This was our last chance to escape
this place...
But I guess thats how things are,
I'll have to think of another way.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
This is the only time we'll hand over
somethin' so easily like this.
The Digital World ain't such a
forgivin' place, you got that?
You better remember it!
translation:
This is the only time we'll hand over
somethin' so easily like this.
The Digital World ain't such a
forgivin' place, you got that?
You better remember it!

original:
Oh, Shuu!
Did you find the Bandits??
I was worried because we couldn't
get in contact with you...
...What?
You found the Black Box??
You got it back? 
From the Bandits??
H-how on earth did you...
You defeated them?!
B-both of them?!?
Whaaat???
That's unbelieveable!
You're incredible, Shuu!
Thanks to you, we can finally
return to the DigiBase!
We'll be waiting for you
at the DigiPort♪
translation:
Oh, Shuu!
Did you find the Bandits??
I was worried because we couldn't
get in contact with you...
...What?
You found the Black Box??
You got it back? 
From the Bandits??
H-how on earth did you...
You defeated them?!
B-both of them?!?
Whaaat???
That's unbelieveable!
You're incredible, Shuu!
Thanks to you, we can finally
return to the DigiBase!
We'll be waiting for you
at the DigiPort♪

original:
The trial version ends here.

Thanks for playing!
translation:
The trial version ends here.

Thanks for playing!

original:
Hey, Shuu, isn't the Palette Key
around here somewhere?
Hurry and open the Port Gate!
translation:
Hey, Shuu, isn't the Palette Key
around here somewhere?
Hurry and open the Port Gate!

original:
Shuu, you're going the wrong way!

Hurry and come this way!
translation:
Shuu, you're going the wrong way!

Hurry and come this way!

original:
Are you okay, Shuu?
Don't worry, Momentai!
Everyone fails once in a while, okay?

It's not important whether you win
or lose,
What's important is that you never
give up!
translation:
Are you okay, Shuu?
Don't worry, Momentai!
Everyone fails once in a while, okay?

It's not important whether you win
or lose,
What's important is that you never
give up!

original:
Your DigiFarm would be much
livelier with some Digimon in it.
You can have your Digimon in the
DigiLab create Weapons and Armor,
As well as let them undergo 
training!
translation:
Your DigiFarm would be much
livelier with some Digimon in it.
You can have your Digimon in the
DigiLab create Weapons and Armor,
As well as let them undergo 
training!

original:
You can alter a lot of things about
the DigiFarm.
Be sure to create a Farm that suits
your particular Digimon, got it?
translation:
You can alter a lot of things about
the DigiFarm.
Be sure to create a Farm that suits
your particular Digimon, got it?

original:
The DigiBase is basically like
a base camp.
Everything a Tamer needs can be
found right here.
You also return here when you are
defeated in battle.
translation:
The DigiBase is basically like
a base camp.
Everything a Tamer needs can be
found right here.
You also return here when you are
defeated in battle.

original:
There used to be other Tamers
here too, a long time ago.
But now there's only Digimon.
translation:
There used to be other Tamers
here too, a long time ago.
But now there's only Digimon.

original:
Requests from Digimon are 
delivered to your Quest PC.
I wonder if you've received a lot
of requests yet?
It's a Tamer's duty to fufill those
requests!
translation:
Requests from Digimon are 
delivered to your Quest PC.
I wonder if you've received a lot
of requests yet?
It's a Tamer's duty to fufill those
requests!

original:
Up ahead is the DigiPort, where
the DigiShip docks.
Once you've got a DigiShip,

You can go to other DigiPorts from
here in an instant!
As long as you've got the address,
you can go wherever you want!
You can find DigiPorts in all sorts
of areas,
So don't forget to open any gates
you see right away, got it?
translation:
Up ahead is the DigiPort, where
the DigiShip docks.
Once you've got a DigiShip,

You can go to other DigiPorts from
here in an instant!
As long as you've got the address,
you can go wherever you want!
You can find DigiPorts in all sorts
of areas,
So don't forget to open any gates
you see right away, got it?

original:
We need the Evolution Tree in 
order to Digivolve.
If you insert the Plates you get
by repairing them with the tools,
You'll unlock more and more
Digivolution options!
I hope the Evolution Tree gets 
completed soon...!
translation:
We need the Evolution Tree in 
order to Digivolve.
If you insert the Plates you get
by repairing them with the tools,
You'll unlock more and more
Digivolution options!
I hope the Evolution Tree gets 
completed soon...!

original:
Your DigiReport has arrived!
Would you like to see it?
translation:
Your DigiReport has arrived!
Would you like to see it?

original: Yes
translation: Yes

original: No
translation: No

original:
Obtained a Consumable Item!
^0
translation:
Obtained a Consumable Item!
^0

original:
Obtained Consumable Items!
^0　×^1
translation:
Obtained Consumable Items!
^0　×^1

original:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^0
translation:
Obtained a piece of Equipment!
^0

original:
Obtained Equipment!
^0　×^1
translation:
Obtained Equipment!
^0　×^1

original:
Obtained a Bug Plate!
^0
translation:
Obtained a Bug Plate!
^0

original:
Obtained Bug Plates!
^0　×^1
translation:
Obtained Bug Plates!
^0　×^1

original:
Obtained Farm Goods!
^0
translation:
Obtained Farm Goods!
^0

original:
Obtained Farm Goods!
^0　×^1
translation:
Obtained Farm Goods!
^0　×^1

original:
Obtained a DigiPlate!
^0
translation:
Obtained a DigiPlate!
^0

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^0
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^0

original: Obtained ^1 bits!
translation: Obtained ^1 bits!

original: Obtained ^1 Tamer Points!
translation: Obtained ^1 Tamer Points!

original: Quest Cleared!
translation: Quest Cleared!

original:
Are you ^P?

Well, you see, I lost some very
valuable goods...
Have you heard about 
'Farm Goods'?
They're important item used to
train Digimon in the Farm.
But I must have dropped them
somewhere in Chip Forest.
I'll make it worth your while if
you can go find them for me.
So could you go take a look?

That's right!

I'd better give you the address 
of the Chip Forest's DigiPort!
translation:
Are you ^P?

Well, you see, I lost some very
valuable goods...
Have you heard about 
'Farm Goods'?
They're important item used to
train Digimon in the Farm.
But I must have dropped them
somewhere in Chip Forest.
I'll make it worth your while if
you can go find them for me.
So could you go take a look?

That's right!

I'd better give you the address 
of the Chip Forest's DigiPort!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Chip Forest Address
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Chip Forest Address

original:
With that, you can now fly there
using the DigiShip.
translation:
With that, you can now fly there
using the DigiShip.

original:
I lost the 'Farm Goods' 
somewhere in Chip Forest.
translation:
I lost the 'Farm Goods' 
somewhere in Chip Forest.

original:
Are you ^P?

Well, you see, I lost some very
valuable goods...
Have you heard about 
'Farm Goods'?
They're important items used to
train Digimon in the Farm.
But I must have dropped them
somewhere in Chip Forest.
I'll make it worth your while if
you can go find them for me.
So could you go take a look?
translation:
Are you ^P?

Well, you see, I lost some very
valuable goods...
Have you heard about 
'Farm Goods'?
They're important items used to
train Digimon in the Farm.
But I must have dropped them
somewhere in Chip Forest.
I'll make it worth your while if
you can go find them for me.
So could you go take a look?

original:
Thank you! With these, I can train
and become stronger!
Here, take these 'Farm Goods'
as a reward!
...Don't tell me you don't know
how to set them up??
You gotta at least know that much
if you wanna be a Tamer!
Then I'd better teach you!

First, while in the DigiFarm,
select 'Manage Goods',
From there, just choose which
goods you'd like to set!
By undergoing 'training' while
using those goods...
Your Digimon will gradually
become much stronger!
Got that? Then good luck!
translation:
Thank you! With these, I can train
and become stronger!
Here, take these 'Farm Goods'
as a reward!
...Don't tell me you don't know
how to set them up??
You gotta at least know that much
if you wanna be a Tamer!
Then I'd better teach you!

First, while in the DigiFarm,
select 'Manage Goods',
From there, just choose which
goods you'd like to set!
By undergoing 'training' while
using those goods...
Your Digimon will gradually
become much stronger!
Got that? Then good luck!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Tanemon's Goods
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Tanemon's Goods

original:
Uhmm...
Okay, to set your Farm Goods...
First, while in the DigiFarm,
select 'Manage Goods',
From there, just choose which
goods you'd like to set!
By undergoing 'training' while
using those goods...
Your Digimon will gradually
become much stronger!
Got that? Then good luck!
translation:
Uhmm...
Okay, to set your Farm Goods...
First, while in the DigiFarm,
select 'Manage Goods',
From there, just choose which
goods you'd like to set!
By undergoing 'training' while
using those goods...
Your Digimon will gradually
become much stronger!
Got that? Then good luck!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
Tanemon's Goods
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
Tanemon's Goods

original:
Yo, ^P!
I've got a favor to ask of you!
I'd like to deliver this lunchbox
to my friend, Wormmon.
They're always working so hard!

So I made this lunchbox myself
to help cheer them on!
But in order to reach Magnet
Mine, where Wormmon is,
You gotta travel underground...

And you see, I don't have the
'Dig' skill to do that...
That's why I'm here asking you!

Could you please go to Magnet
Mine in my place?
First, go to Login Mountain and
ask Armadillomon for digging tips!
translation:
Yo, ^P!
I've got a favor to ask of you!
I'd like to deliver this lunchbox
to my friend, Wormmon.
They're always working so hard!

So I made this lunchbox myself
to help cheer them on!
But in order to reach Magnet
Mine, where Wormmon is,
You gotta travel underground...

And you see, I don't have the
'Dig' skill to do that...
That's why I'm here asking you!

Could you please go to Magnet
Mine in my place?
First, go to Login Mountain and
ask Armadillomon for digging tips!

original:
Obtained a key item!
Agumon's Lunchbox
translation:
Obtained a key item!
Agumon's Lunchbox

original:
Armadillomon knows more about
how to use the 'Dig' skill,
So try asking them over at Login 
Mountain!
translation:
Armadillomon knows more about
how to use the 'Dig' skill,
So try asking them over at Login 
Mountain!

original:
Armadillomon knows more about
how to use the 'Dig' skill,
So try asking them over at Login 
Mountain!
translation:
Armadillomon knows more about
how to use the 'Dig' skill,
So try asking them over at Login 
Mountain!

original:
^P! Welcome back!
...Are those...? 
Wormmon's cookies?

I'm super hungry right now, too!

Looks like Wormmon's doing just
fine, too...
You even brought their present
back! Great work, Tamer!
Here's your reward!
Thanks!
translation:
^P! Welcome back!
...Are those...? 
Wormmon's cookies?

I'm super hungry right now, too!

Looks like Wormmon's doing just
fine, too...
You even brought their present
back! Great work, Tamer!
Here's your reward!
Thanks!

original:
Handed over key item
Handmade Cookies
translation:
Handed over key item
Handmade Cookies

original:
I'll ask for your help if I run into
any trouble again.
Thanks again, ^P!
translation:
I'll ask for your help if I run into
any trouble again.
Thanks again, ^P!

original:
You want to know how to 'Dig'?
I absolutely LOVE to dig!
I want everyone in the world to 
understand the joys of digging!
But only certain kinds of Digimon
can use that skill.
So if you want to go digging
underground,
You'll need to have a Digimon
with the 'Dig' skill in your party.
The Dorumon around here
have the 'Dig' skill!
Remember! The 'Dig' skill
is a very valuable one!
translation:
You want to know how to 'Dig'?
I absolutely LOVE to dig!
I want everyone in the world to 
understand the joys of digging!
But only certain kinds of Digimon
can use that skill.
So if you want to go digging
underground,
You'll need to have a Digimon
with the 'Dig' skill in your party.
The Dorumon around here
have the 'Dig' skill!
Remember! The 'Dig' skill
is a very valuable one!

original:
Dorumon possess the 'Dig' skill!

You wanna get to Magnet Mine?

Then use that large hole thats at 
the other end, it's just over there!
translation:
Dorumon possess the 'Dig' skill!

You wanna get to Magnet Mine?

Then use that large hole thats at 
the other end, it's just over there!

original:
Hm? Do you need me for
something?
Hm?!

Is that the lunch box that
Agumon prepared for me?!
I see! So you've come to deliver
it to me...
Thank you for taking the trouble
to come all this way!
I know! I'll give him these cookies
I baked in return!
You said your name was 
^P, right?
Could you please pass these
cookies on to Agumon for me?
I'd better take a break.
Take care on your trip back!
translation:
Hm? Do you need me for
something?
Hm?!

Is that the lunch box that
Agumon prepared for me?!
I see! So you've come to deliver
it to me...
Thank you for taking the trouble
to come all this way!
I know! I'll give him these cookies
I baked in return!
You said your name was 
^P, right?
Could you please pass these
cookies on to Agumon for me?
I'd better take a break.
Take care on your trip back!

original:
Handed over key item
Agumon's Lunchbox
translation:
Handed over key item
Agumon's Lunchbox

original:
Obtained key item!
Handmade Cookies
translation:
Obtained key item!
Handmade Cookies

original: Munch munch...
translation: Munch munch...

original:
Hmmm...
So you're ^P?
Hey... Are you really as strong
as they say you are...?
Everyone's been making a big fuss
because a Tamer showed up.
But I'd like to see the true extent
of your abilities.
If you can use a 'Skill' to cut down 
a tree 
That's blocking the way to Label
Forest, then find a 'Leafy Branch'
Then I'll acknowledge you as a
true Tamer!
Palmon's more familiar with how
to use 'Skill's,
So I suggest you ask Palmon in
Label Forest about it, first.
Oh, that's right,

You'll need the address to Label
Forest to get there, won't you?
Then here, take it.
translation:
Hmmm...
So you're ^P?
Hey... Are you really as strong
as they say you are...?
Everyone's been making a big fuss
because a Tamer showed up.
But I'd like to see the true extent
of your abilities.
If you can use a 'Skill' to cut down 
a tree 
That's blocking the way to Label
Forest, then find a 'Leafy Branch'
Then I'll acknowledge you as a
true Tamer!
Palmon's more familiar with how
to use 'Skill's,
So I suggest you ask Palmon in
Label Forest about it, first.
Oh, that's right,

You'll need the address to Label
Forest to get there, won't you?
Then here, take it.

original:
Obtained a Key item!
Label Forest Address
translation:
Obtained a Key item!
Label Forest Address

original:
Got it?

Use a 'Skill' to cut down a tree in
Label Forest.
Palmon's more familiar with how
to use 'Skill's,
So I suggest you ask Palmon in
Label Forest about it, first.
translation:
Got it?

Use a 'Skill' to cut down a tree in
Label Forest.
Palmon's more familiar with how
to use 'Skill's,
So I suggest you ask Palmon in
Label Forest about it, first.

original:
Hmmm...
So you're ^P?
Hey... Are you really as strong
as they say you are...?
Everyone's been making a big fuss
because a Tamer showed up.
But I'd like to see the true extent
of your abilities.
If you can use a 'Skill' to cut down 
a tree 
That's blocking the way to Label
Forest, then find a 'Leafy Branch'
Then I'll acknowledge you as a
true Tamer!
Palmon's more familiar with how
to use 'Skill's,
So I suggest you ask Palmon in
Label Forest about it, first.
translation:
Hmmm...
So you're ^P?
Hey... Are you really as strong
as they say you are...?
Everyone's been making a big fuss
because a Tamer showed up.
But I'd like to see the true extent
of your abilities.
If you can use a 'Skill' to cut down 
a tree 
That's blocking the way to Label
Forest, then find a 'Leafy Branch'
Then I'll acknowledge you as a
true Tamer!
Palmon's more familiar with how
to use 'Skill's,
So I suggest you ask Palmon in
Label Forest about it, first.

original:
Wow, you really are something else.

Keep this up and grow to become
a powerful Tamer!
Skills are just the starting point, so
work hard and don't give up!
Here's your reward. 
Go ahead and take it.
translation:
Wow, you really are something else.

Keep this up and grow to become
a powerful Tamer!
Skills are just the starting point, so
work hard and don't give up!
Here's your reward. 
Go ahead and take it.

original:
Handed over Key item
Leafy Branch
translation:
Handed over Key item
Leafy Branch

original:
To tell the truth, I've always 
wanted to try using a Skill, myself.
You've gotta teach me someday!
translation:
To tell the truth, I've always 
wanted to try using a Skill, myself.
You've gotta teach me someday!

original:
You want to know how to use
'Skill's?
Oh, that's easy.

All you have to do is place a Digimon
with the required Skill in your party
Then you can clear objects in your
way without issue.
I recall you saying something about
needing to cut down a tree, right?
In that case,
You'll need to bring a Digimon with
the skill 'Tree Cut'.
Let's see... Hyokomon and 
Falcomon can use that skill!
translation:
You want to know how to use
'Skill's?
Oh, that's easy.

All you have to do is place a Digimon
with the required Skill in your party
Then you can clear objects in your
way without issue.
I recall you saying something about
needing to cut down a tree, right?
In that case,
You'll need to bring a Digimon with
the skill 'Tree Cut'.
Let's see... Hyokomon and 
Falcomon can use that skill!

original:
Let's see... 

Hyokomon and Falcomon can use 
the 'Tree Cut' skill!
translation:
Let's see... 

Hyokomon and Falcomon can use 
the 'Tree Cut' skill!

original:
You did it! You successfully used
a 'Skill'!
Skills are very important, so be
sure to remember them!
translation:
You did it! You successfully used
a 'Skill'!
Skills are very important, so be
sure to remember them!

original:
Obtained a Key item!
Leafy Branch
translation:
Obtained a Key item!
Leafy Branch

original:
Seems there's been a mysterious 
shadow in Loop Swamp lately...
I went to investigate, but turns out
it was an Ebidramon.
I heard rumors you were an 
outstanding Tamer, ^P.
So could you help make Ebidramon
get out of the swamp?
You can only get to Loop Swamp
by going underwater,
So you'll need a Digimon with
the 'Dive' skill.
You should go see Kamemon
at Packet Coast first,
And hear about using the 'Dive'
skill.
translation:
Seems there's been a mysterious 
shadow in Loop Swamp lately...
I went to investigate, but turns out
it was an Ebidramon.
I heard rumors you were an 
outstanding Tamer, ^P.
So could you help make Ebidramon
get out of the swamp?
You can only get to Loop Swamp
by going underwater,
So you'll need a Digimon with
the 'Dive' skill.
You should go see Kamemon
at Packet Coast first,
And hear about using the 'Dive'
skill.

original:
Please go to Loop Swamp using
the 'Dive' skill.
You should go see Kamemon
at Packet Coast first,
And hear about using the 'Dive'
skill.
translation:
Please go to Loop Swamp using
the 'Dive' skill.
You should go see Kamemon
at Packet Coast first,
And hear about using the 'Dive'
skill.

original:
I see, so you helped Ebidramon
understand the situation?
Now everyone should feel safe 
again. Thank you, ^P.
Great job! Here's your reward.
translation:
I see, so you helped Ebidramon
understand the situation?
Now everyone should feel safe 
again. Thank you, ^P.
Great job! Here's your reward.

original:
I hope you can help us out next 
time we need it, too.
translation:
I hope you can help us out next 
time we need it, too.

original:
Diving underwater...?

To do that, you just gotta ride a
Digimon with the 'Dive' skill.
Just like that! Boing! Splosh!
And there ya go!
Hm? Lunamon asked you to ask
me about it...?
You could have said that earlier!
Ahem...!
First you'll need to find a Digimon 
with the 'Dive' skill...
Betamon, for example. Then you
just place them in your party.
Then just go to any place with
a fountain spring and...
Dive right in!
Give it a try!
Of course, you'll need a Digimon
with the 'Dive' skill, first, though.
translation:
Diving underwater...?

To do that, you just gotta ride a
Digimon with the 'Dive' skill.
Just like that! Boing! Splosh!
And there ya go!
Hm? Lunamon asked you to ask
me about it...?
You could have said that earlier!
Ahem...!
First you'll need to find a Digimon 
with the 'Dive' skill...
Betamon, for example. Then you
just place them in your party.
Then just go to any place with
a fountain spring and...
Dive right in!
Give it a try!
Of course, you'll need a Digimon
with the 'Dive' skill, first, though.

original:
Betamon has the 'Dive' skill. You
can find them around this area.
You just gotta scan and convert
them...
There's a fountain near the sea, 
so you can just dive right in there.
Oh, and in Loop Swamp, there'll be
whirlpools you can use to travel, too.
You can go to another location just
by approaching a big whirlpool!
But take note, you can't go back
through a whirlpool you came from.
So be careful!
translation:
Betamon has the 'Dive' skill. You
can find them around this area.
You just gotta scan and convert
them...
There's a fountain near the sea, 
so you can just dive right in there.
Oh, and in Loop Swamp, there'll be
whirlpools you can use to travel, too.
You can go to another location just
by approaching a big whirlpool!
But take note, you can't go back
through a whirlpool you came from.
So be careful!

original:
Wh-who are you...?
Have you come to t-tease me...?
I-I can be serious too, w-when 
push comes to shove...!
translation:
Wh-who are you...?
Have you come to t-tease me...?
I-I can be serious too, w-when 
push comes to shove...!

original:
Ow ow ow...

I-I was just hiding in the water 
because I'm a bit of a scaredy-cat.
W-what's that...?
A mysterious shadow...?
I see... So I've been scaring 
everyone by accident...
Did you say your name was
^P...?
Could you tell everyone they 
don't need to be afraid...?
I-I'll do my best to leave the
water, t-too...
translation:
Ow ow ow...

I-I was just hiding in the water 
because I'm a bit of a scaredy-cat.
W-what's that...?
A mysterious shadow...?
I see... So I've been scaring 
everyone by accident...
Did you say your name was
^P...?
Could you tell everyone they 
don't need to be afraid...?
I-I'll do my best to leave the
water, t-too...

original:
Help me let everyone know they 
don't need to be afraid, okay...?
translation:
Help me let everyone know they 
don't need to be afraid, okay...?

original:
Hello, ^P, I've got a favor
to ask of you.
Recently, Dracmon's been playing
a lot of pranks.
It's been causing a lot of trouble
around Packet Coast.
Could you go teach them a lesson
for me...?
translation:
Hello, ^P, I've got a favor
to ask of you.
Recently, Dracmon's been playing
a lot of pranks.
It's been causing a lot of trouble
around Packet Coast.
Could you go teach them a lesson
for me...?

original:
Dracmon especially likes to annoy
me all the time.
I really want to be friends with 
them, so I wonder why...
Dracmon's pranks are causing
problems for everyone.
So please go to Packet Coast and
teach them a lesson.
translation:
Dracmon especially likes to annoy
me all the time.
I really want to be friends with 
them, so I wonder why...
Dracmon's pranks are causing
problems for everyone.
So please go to Packet Coast and
teach them a lesson.

original:
Welcome back, ^P!
How'd it go?
I see, seems Dracmon isn't such
a bad guy,
But they just need some time to
cool down, right?
Thank you for your help,
^P.
Here's your reward.
translation:
Welcome back, ^P!
How'd it go?
I see, seems Dracmon isn't such
a bad guy,
But they just need some time to
cool down, right?
Thank you for your help,
^P.
Here's your reward.

original:
You're really reliable,
^P.
I'll be sure to let everyone know!
translation:
You're really reliable,
^P.
I'll be sure to let everyone know!

original:
Hm?? What's that??
You got business with me??
Stop my pranks, you say?
I'm causing trouble, you say??
No way! 
I'll do what I want!
If you insist! 
Then have a taste of my claws!
translation:
Hm?? What's that??
You got business with me??
Stop my pranks, you say?
I'm causing trouble, you say??
No way! 
I'll do what I want!
If you insist! 
Then have a taste of my claws!

original:
Hm?? What's this??
Why're you so strong??
I-I just let my guard down, today!
I'm actually much stronger!
My claws'll rip you to shreds one 
day, don't you forget it!
translation:
Hm?? What's this??
Why're you so strong??
I-I just let my guard down, today!
I'm actually much stronger!
My claws'll rip you to shreds one 
day, don't you forget it!

original:
Whaddya want?!
Get lost!
I'll bite, you know! Grrrr!
translation:
Whaddya want?!
Get lost!
I'll bite, you know! Grrrr!

original:
I just had a brilliant idea!

I was just thinking of how to get
your name more out there!
That's when I thought of making
cards!
You'll become super popular in
no time, handing these out!
Could you try handing out these
two cards at Packet Coast?
translation:
I just had a brilliant idea!

I was just thinking of how to get
your name more out there!
That's when I thought of making
cards!
You'll become super popular in
no time, handing these out!
Could you try handing out these
two cards at Packet Coast?

original:
Obtained a key item!
Popularity Card A
translation:
Obtained a key item!
Popularity Card A

original:
Obtained a key item!
Popularity Card B
translation:
Obtained a key item!
Popularity Card B

original:
As for who...
Tanemon and Kokuwamon should
be at Packet Coast!
Try giving out these two cards to
them!
translation:
As for who...
Tanemon and Kokuwamon should
be at Packet Coast!
Try giving out these two cards to
them!

original:
Great work, have you managed to
give both cards away...?
That's wonderful!

Now everyone will acknowledge 
you as a Tamer, I'm sure!
Here's your reward! 
Use it wisely!
translation:
Great work, have you managed to
give both cards away...?
That's wonderful!

Now everyone will acknowledge 
you as a Tamer, I'm sure!
Here's your reward! 
Use it wisely!

original:
Everyone's been waiting for a
Tamer to arrive...
I wish you luck from here on,
^P.
translation:
Everyone's been waiting for a
Tamer to arrive...
I wish you luck from here on,
^P.

original:
A popularity card?
Guess I'll take one.
Whoa, there's a lotta details here
about you, ^P.
I'll be sure to come to you 
whenever I need help.
translation:
A popularity card?
Guess I'll take one.
Whoa, there's a lotta details here
about you, ^P.
I'll be sure to come to you 
whenever I need help.

original:
Handed over a key item
Popularity Card A
translation:
Handed over a key item
Popularity Card A

original:
Maybe I should try making one of
these popularity cards, too...
translation:
Maybe I should try making one of
these popularity cards, too...

original:
^P?
I've heard about you...
A popularity card...?
Sure, I'll take it...
I'll approach you next time I 
require any assistance...
Thank you...
translation:
^P?
I've heard about you...
A popularity card...?
Sure, I'll take it...
I'll approach you next time I 
require any assistance...
Thank you...

original:
Handed over a key item
Popularity Card B
translation:
Handed over a key item
Popularity Card B

original:
I'll be sure to come to you if I need
any help in the future.
translation:
I'll be sure to come to you if I need
any help in the future.

original:
Hey, ^P,
I've got a favor to ask.
Well you see...

Biyomon and I were supposed to 
have a race at Label Forest.
But then I realized I haven't had
any lunch yet.
So could you help me out, and
let Biyomon know I'll be late?
translation:
Hey, ^P,
I've got a favor to ask.
Well you see...

Biyomon and I were supposed to 
have a race at Label Forest.
But then I realized I haven't had
any lunch yet.
So could you help me out, and
let Biyomon know I'll be late?

original:
I can't unleash my full power on
an empty stomach, after all.
Biyomon's in Label Forest, please
relay my message to them.
translation:
I can't unleash my full power on
an empty stomach, after all.
Biyomon's in Label Forest, please
relay my message to them.

original:
Munch munch...
Welcome back, ^P.
I see, so Biyomon's willing to wait
a little longer.
Hmmm...
Maybe I should get some dessert?
Thank you, ^P.

Here's your reward.
translation:
Munch munch...
Welcome back, ^P.
I see, so Biyomon's willing to wait
a little longer.
Hmmm...
Maybe I should get some dessert?
Thank you, ^P.

Here's your reward.

original:
Hey, 
I've got both pudding and jelly...
Which do you think I should eat
first, ^P?
translation:
Hey, 
I've got both pudding and jelly...
Which do you think I should eat
first, ^P?

original:
Jeez, just how long are they gonna
make me wait?! This is the worst!
What? Patamon's gonna be late?
Because they're... eating lunch?!
Grrrr! Now I'm angry!
You'd better look out!
translation:
Jeez, just how long are they gonna
make me wait?! This is the worst!
What? Patamon's gonna be late?
Because they're... eating lunch?!
Grrrr! Now I'm angry!
You'd better look out!

original:
I'm so sorry!
I let my anger take over!
Even though Patamon's the 
cause of my anger...
Ah, but I feel much better after
letting it all out.
Could you go let Patamon know
I'll wait for them!
translation:
I'm so sorry!
I let my anger take over!
Even though Patamon's the 
cause of my anger...
Ah, but I feel much better after
letting it all out.
Could you go let Patamon know
I'll wait for them!

original:
But only this once! Tell them it 
won't happen again!
translation:
But only this once! Tell them it 
won't happen again!

original:
Greetings, ^P.

I remember finding a positively
beautiful DigiFlower earlier...
But I've completely forgotten 
where it was.
I'm pretty sure it was somewhere
around Login Mountain.
Could I trouble you to help me
look for it?
translation:
Greetings, ^P.

I remember finding a positively
beautiful DigiFlower earlier...
But I've completely forgotten 
where it was.
I'm pretty sure it was somewhere
around Login Mountain.
Could I trouble you to help me
look for it?

original:
It was a very large pink and 
yellow flower!
I remember seeing it somewhere
around Login Mountain...
Could I trouble you to help me look
for it?
translation:
It was a very large pink and 
yellow flower!
I remember seeing it somewhere
around Login Mountain...
Could I trouble you to help me look
for it?

original:
I see...
So it was a Sunflowmon...
And it was so beautiful, too...

I'm sorry to have troubled you
with this, ^P.
But I'm delighted that you did 
your best to help look for it!
It's not much, but please take
this as a reward.
translation:
I see...
So it was a Sunflowmon...
And it was so beautiful, too...

I'm sorry to have troubled you
with this, ^P.
But I'm delighted that you did 
your best to help look for it!
It's not much, but please take
this as a reward.

original:
Still, the fact it was a Sunflowmon
sure is a surprise.
I was hoping to make it into a
pressed flower...
But I guess that's impossible now,
sigh...
translation:
Still, the fact it was a Sunflowmon
sure is a surprise.
I was hoping to make it into a
pressed flower...
But I guess that's impossible now,
sigh...

original:
DigiFlower...?
Did you say DigiFlower...?
Damn it!
I've had enough of this!
Everyone keeps calling me a
DigiFlower just because of my face!
Just because my face is flower-
shaped doesn't mean I'm a flower!
Apologize! NOW!!!
translation:
DigiFlower...?
Did you say DigiFlower...?
Damn it!
I've had enough of this!
Everyone keeps calling me a
DigiFlower just because of my face!
Just because my face is flower-
shaped doesn't mean I'm a flower!
Apologize! NOW!!!

original:
I give! I give!
I've lost!
You sure are strong... Why are you
looking for a flower, anyway?
Gabumon was looking for it...?

Come to think of it, I did see a 
Gabumon looking at me before...
Gah!

So they also mistook me for a
DigiFlower?!
So that's what happened!
Damn it!
Go tell Gabumon that they've got
it all wrong, okay?!
translation:
I give! I give!
I've lost!
You sure are strong... Why are you
looking for a flower, anyway?
Gabumon was looking for it...?

Come to think of it, I did see a 
Gabumon looking at me before...
Gah!

So they also mistook me for a
DigiFlower?!
So that's what happened!
Damn it!
Go tell Gabumon that they've got
it all wrong, okay?!

original:
To think Gabumon mistook me for
a DigiFlower...
Their eyes must be broken or 
something!
translation:
To think Gabumon mistook me for
a DigiFlower...
Their eyes must be broken or 
something!

original:
H-hello, ^P.

Do you mind listening to my
request?
I... I've decided to enter the
Stone Contest...!
But I'm no good at making a
decision with my decorations...
I'm thinking of using a DigiStone
from Magnet Mine...!
Could you please go get one for
me, ^P?
translation:
H-hello, ^P.

Do you mind listening to my
request?
I... I've decided to enter the
Stone Contest...!
But I'm no good at making a
decision with my decorations...
I'm thinking of using a DigiStone
from Magnet Mine...!
Could you please go get one for
me, ^P?

original:
I heard that the DigiStones from
Magnet Mine look really cool!
If I could get my hands on it, I'll
win the contest, no doubt!
translation:
I heard that the DigiStones from
Magnet Mine look really cool!
If I could get my hands on it, I'll
win the contest, no doubt!

original:
Welcome back, ^P!

Whoa, it's a DigiStone!
It really does look super cool...!
Thank you so much! 
I'll win the contest for sure, now!
Oh yeah!
I'd better give you your reward.
Thank you so much, really!
translation:
Welcome back, ^P!

Whoa, it's a DigiStone!
It really does look super cool...!
Thank you so much! 
I'll win the contest for sure, now!
Oh yeah!
I'd better give you your reward.
Thank you so much, really!

original:
Handed over key item
DigiStone
translation:
Handed over key item
DigiStone

original:
I just need to put this here, and 
then do this, and... Yeah!
I think it's going well... W-wow...
This is making me really nervous...
translation:
I just need to put this here, and 
then do this, and... Yeah!
I think it's going well... W-wow...
This is making me really nervous...

original:
Who're you?!
This DigiStone is mine!
They're ALL mine!
I won't give you a single pebble!
translation:
Who're you?!
This DigiStone is mine!
They're ALL mine!
I won't give you a single pebble!

original:
I just wanted to put these on so 
I could win the Stone Contest...
That's all...

But, I...
I...!
You see, my body isn't actually
made of stone!
So fine, I'll give one to you!
translation:
I just wanted to put these on so 
I could win the Stone Contest...
That's all...

But, I...
I...!
You see, my body isn't actually
made of stone!
So fine, I'll give one to you!

original:
Obtained a key item!
DigiStone
translation:
Obtained a key item!
DigiStone

original:
Next time, remember when there's
a contest, okay?!
translation:
Next time, remember when there's
a contest, okay?!

original:
I wish I could enter it...
That Stone Contest...
translation:
I wish I could enter it...
That Stone Contest...

original:
T-this is terrible!
^P!
A distant relative of mine entrusted
me with their child, but...
T-the child... has gone missing!

Wha...? T-their name...?
Their name is Chicchimon...
They've mentioned before that
they'd like to see Loop Swamp...
Don't tell me...
Please, could you go take a look?
translation:
T-this is terrible!
^P!
A distant relative of mine entrusted
me with their child, but...
T-the child... has gone missing!

Wha...? T-their name...?
Their name is Chicchimon...
They've mentioned before that
they'd like to see Loop Swamp...
Don't tell me...
Please, could you go take a look?

original:
Chicchimon wanted to go to
Loop Swamp...
So they may have gone there
all by themself...
The whirlpools at Loop Swamp let
you travel from one place to another
You can move to another area by
approaching a big whirlpool.
But you can't go back through a
whirlpool you've come through.
S-so, please be careful...
translation:
Chicchimon wanted to go to
Loop Swamp...
So they may have gone there
all by themself...
The whirlpools at Loop Swamp let
you travel from one place to another
You can move to another area by
approaching a big whirlpool.
But you can't go back through a
whirlpool you've come through.
S-so, please be careful...

original:
Oh! ^P!
Did you find Chicchimon?
I-I see, so they're okay...

I'll be sure to keep a closer eye on
them from now on!
Here's your reward, as promised!
Thank you so much, ^P!
translation:
Oh! ^P!
Did you find Chicchimon?
I-I see, so they're okay...

I'll be sure to keep a closer eye on
them from now on!
Here's your reward, as promised!
Thank you so much, ^P!

original:
Chicchimon wanders all over the 
place, so it's difficult to keep up...
But thanks to you, ^P,
we were able to find them.
translation:
Chicchimon wanders all over the 
place, so it's difficult to keep up...
But thanks to you, ^P,
we were able to find them.

original:
Wheeee!
Spinning around is so much fun!
Hmm??
Do you need me for something?
Uncle Hawkmon is looking for me...?

Jeez!
He's always treating me like a child!
But I guess I shouldn't have
wandered off without a word...
I'll have to go apologize later!
Thanks for checking on me!
translation:
Wheeee!
Spinning around is so much fun!
Hmm??
Do you need me for something?
Uncle Hawkmon is looking for me...?

Jeez!
He's always treating me like a child!
But I guess I shouldn't have
wandered off without a word...
I'll have to go apologize later!
Thanks for checking on me!

original:
Uncle Hawkmon can be such a
worrywart sometimes!
translation:
Uncle Hawkmon can be such a
worrywart sometimes!
